title: Mary Margaret Liedl, Mexican Photographer, Jeffrey Petrich, Ramon Muxter, and Gus Foster, from "Fun, Friends, and Relatives"
marks:
Inscription

on back, in pencil: [back cover / 1
description: souvenir portrait (from L) of woman (Mary Liedl) seated on a donkey painted as a zebra holding a sombrero painted \"JUST MARRIED\" and wearing a sombrero painted \"HONEYMOON\", Mexican guide wearing \"TIAJUANA\" sombrero, man (Jeff Petrich) wearing \"MARIA\" sombrero, man w/ moustache (Ramon Muxter) wearing sombrero and man w/dark moustache (Gus Foster) wearing \"PANCHO\" sombrero; souvenir white and blue paper folder included
creditline: Gift of Gus Foster in memory of Ted Hartwell
